# Change Log
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [Unreleased]

## [1.0.0] - 2020-07-24
### Deprecated
- Drop support for the deprecated Python 2.7 and 3.4 versions

## [0.1.0] - 2015-10-14
### Added
- Initial Release
- Support for `--flake-finder`, `--flake-runs`, and `--flake-max-minutes` options.
- Unit Tests.
